00003 //void gotoxy(int x, int y) places cursor in console programs
00004 //void clrscr() clears the screen
00005 
00006 #include <windows.h> 
00007 
00008 void gotoxy(int x, int y) 
00009 { 
00010     COORD coord; 
00011     coord.X = x; coord.Y = y; 
00012     SetConsoleCursorPosition(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), coord); 
00013 }
00014 
00015 void clrscr() 
00016 { 
00017     COORD coordScreen = { 0, 0 }; 
00018     DWORD cCharsWritten; 
00019     CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO csbi; 
00020     DWORD dwConSize; 
00021     HANDLE hConsole = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE); 
00022     
00023     GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo(hConsole, &csbi); 
00024     dwConSize = csbi.dwSize.X * csbi.dwSize.Y; 
00025     FillConsoleOutputCharacter(hConsole, TEXT(' '), dwConSize, coordScreen, &cCharsWritten); 
00026     GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo(hConsole, &csbi); 
00027     FillConsoleOutputAttribute(hConsole, csbi.wAttributes, dwConSize, coordScreen, &cCharsWritten); 
00028     SetConsoleCursorPosition(hConsole, coordScreen); 
00029 }
00030 
00031 void setrgb(int color)
00032 {
00033         switch (color)
00034         {
00035         case 0: // White on Black
00036                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00037                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00038                 break;
00039         case 1: // Red on Black
00040                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00041                         FOREGROUND_RED);
00042                 break;
00043         case 2: // Green on Black
00044                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00045                         FOREGROUND_GREEN);
00046                 break;
00047         case 3: // Yellow on Black
00048                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00049                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN);
00050                 break;
00051         case 4: // Blue on Black
00052                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00053                         FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00054                 break;
00055         case 5: // Magenta on Black
00056                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00057                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00058                 break;
00059         case 6: // Cyan on Black
00060                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00061                         FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00062                 break;
00063         case 7: // Black on Gray
00064                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00065                         BACKGROUND_INTENSITY);
00066                 break;
00067         case 8: // Black on White
00068                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00069                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
00070                 break;
00071         case 9: // Red on White
00072                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00073                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00074                         FOREGROUND_RED);
00075                 break;
00076         case 10: // Green on White
00077                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00078                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00079                         FOREGROUND_GREEN);
00080                 break;
00081         case 11: // Yellow on White
00082                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00083                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00084                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN);
00085                 break;
00086         case 12: // Blue on White
00087                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00088                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00089                         FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00090                 break;
00091         case 13: // Magenta on White
00092                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00093                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00094                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00095                 break;
00096         case 14: // Cyan on White
00097                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00098                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00099                         FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00100                 break;
00101         case 15: // White on White
00102                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),BACKGROUND_INTENSITY |
00103                         FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLUE |
00104                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00105                 break;
00106         default : // White on Black
00107                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE),FOREGROUND_INTENSITY |
00108                         FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE);
00109                 break;
00110         }
00111 }
